question_stem:
Q2. What is the object “prediction” defined by the code in line 20?

The predicted outcome for data points in the original data set, on KNN classifier with k = 5.
The predicted outcome for data points in the train set, on KNN classifier with k = 5.
The predicted outcome for data points in the test set, based on KNN classifier with k = 5.
